PC Number Date Chapter Chapter Year Bill Dept
 2024-05712024-05-24FIN
ActPension Benefits Standards Act, 1985
SubjectRegulations Amending the Pension Benefits Standards Regulations, 1985 (Negotiated Contribution Plans)
PrecisRegulations Amending the PENSION BENEFITS STANDARDS REGULATIONS, 1985 (NEGOTIATED CONTRIBUTION PLANS) in order to (1) exempt negotiated contribution plans from solvency funding requirements; and (2) set out enhanced going concern funding standards as well as the information requirements for plan governance and funding policies.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2024-0095 Publication Date: 2024-06-05
AttachmentsAttachment
precis: Regulations Amending the PENSION BENEFITS STANDARDS REGULATIONS, 1985 (NEGOTIATED CONTRIBUTION PLANS) in order to (1) exempt negotiated contribution plans from solvency funding requirements; and (2) set out enhanced going concern funding standards as well as the information requirements for plan governance and funding policies.
